input.sentences: virtual reality makes everything look sharp .
the virtual reality people listening to the radio .
chilling on the virtual couch with virtual people .
in the virtual jello mold dancing .
output.sentences: With first person games it's like a new, virtual reality.
I want to throw a party so I just turn on the radio and let people dance.
They hang out on my purple couch to chat.
I like to chat up my favorite virtual friend around the directors chair.
But sometimes parties end up out of control and someone ends up in a jello mold.
